sentences: Goldstein has directed music videos for artists worldwide, including Rod Stewartâ€™s "Downtown Train" Her lesbian vampire musical, Because The Dawn, premiered at the Toronto Film Festival in 1988.
In 2000, Goldstein directed the award-winning feature film East of A about an alternative family facing the challenges of raising a child with HIV.
Based in Los Angeles, she is the sister of film critic and Los Angeles Times columnist Patrick Goldstein.
